main event: A witness observed a bright object moving straight up and down in Fort Bragg, North Carolina on August 6, 1964.
interesting points: The object moved upward and downward before disappearing at a 45-degree angle., The witness could not estimate the size, speed, or altitude of the object., The observation lasted between 5 to 7 seconds., There was no physical evidence found related to the sighting., The conclusion of the case was marked as insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: The witness reported observing the object from the ground with no additional details on identification.
